name: Fatal Twelve Complete Collection
description:
Fatal Twelve Complete Edition includes the game, the original soundtrack, artbook and voice drama.
Fatal Twelve
Shishimai Rinka was a high schooler who ran a small café named Lion House in place of her grandmother. She lived her life much like any other person her age, but one day, she was caught up in an explosion while returning home on the train alongside her friend, Hitsuji Naomi.
Fatal Twelve Original Soundtrack
The complete soundtrack of Fatal Twelve in FLAC and MP3 format.
Contains 48 tracks across 2 discs including the Opening Theme "Unveil" and Ending Theme "Glass Thread". Download includes a digital copy of the CD jacket which includes a track list and lyrics to the two vocal songs.
Fatal Twelve Mini Artbook
Contains 24 pages of illustrations featuring work by character designer shio koji and many others! DLC contains both the English and Japanese version of the artbook.
Fatal Twelve Mini Voice Drama
The mini voice drama CD which was made possible by the Fatal Twelve Kickstarter Campaign.
